class_notes:
(Same as JS 125 1)
(Topic: Introduction to Modern Hebrew Literature)
course_description: Readings (in English) of major works from Biblical narrative to modern Hebrew, Yiddish, and Jewish fiction. Class discussions deal with topics such as Jewish identity, exile, humor, and satire. Satisfies GER IV.A.
sections: Class Nbr: 1927, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: O. Yeglin, Status: Open
